extension.news: - Core: Remove memory optimization for MultiWindow (library view); has no effect on performance but resolves certain rare crashes - Kodigui: Only check for XML validity on first init of a window, not on reinit - Windows: Unify roles click into mixin; reduce visual disturbance when clicking a role - TV Shows: fix positioning of roles section dropdown - SeekDialog/Player: Further fix postplay behaviour when a video was ended "manually" via final credits marker - Home/Movies/Shows/Episodes/Libraries: Implement generic watched toggle; toggle watched via keyboard mapping "w" (buttonCode: 61527) - Home/Movies/Shows/Episodes/Libraries: Generic watched toggle: if wanted, ask before toggling watched status for seasons and TV shows - Shows: Generic watched toggle: allow toggling full show watched/unwatched - Ensure python 2.7 compat (Kodi 18) - Episodes: Generic watched toggle: allow toggling watched/unwatched from main button area for current episode
